page.title: 12HOUSING II
page.content: {Old people's accommodation} includes homes,warden-controlled flats,as well as semi-detached bungalows,terraced bungalows and a nursing home. Our residential area has been proved to be one of{mixed-living {accommodation. In total we found in the area {9976 dwelling-places}in{26 different {categories.} These range from the one flat we found over a pub to the{3258}terraced houses. As one looks at the map of our area it is obvious that the bulk of the housing lies in the southern part of the area. {CONTINUED {SEE HOUSING III FOR TOTAL FIGURES {
